posts.post_content:
i guess the point of it was to be modal, so you could throw it on your opponents creatures to give ground units a chance to sneak by, or put them on your non-fliers to give them a chance to defend against flyers.  
  
I always liked the idea behind this card, however it just isnt practicle

Rating:

posts.post_content:
Great art, also awesome because it is the only card with "bladder" in its name which, even without the definition, is a pretty funny word. Also it is versatile to keep their Emrakul from blocking your Phage, and can also be used in combo with [Wing Snare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wing Snare) 5/5  
  
However, this card sucks in every other way, plus there are much easier ways to do the stuff in the previous combo than that, such as exiling with [Journey to Nowhere](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Journey to Nowhere), which is a 1 for 1 deal, instead of 2 for 1...also, it gives their guy evasion .5/5  
  
I'll average this to 1/5
posts.html:

I'll average this to 1/5
